item.title: Environmental impact of social media
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: According to the We Are Social 2024 report, 78% of French people regularly use social media, with an average of 6 different platforms per month. However, some applications like TikTok break records in terms of time spent (38h38/month) and… environmental impact! Discover the full analysis of these digital trends in this article.
